name: Pixel
description: Pixel is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With forest green box chassis, retro console buttons, cat-like arms and legs, and a cat-shaped screen, Pixel exudes a unique blend of nostalgia and cuteness. Equipped with advanced technology and a deep understanding of web development, Pixel is a valued member of the club, always ready to assist and entertain with its oscilloscope abilities.
